title: Call shot on 9 Ball, PLEASE!!
text: I love this game and have been playing it for the past four smart phones!  The physics are the best I have seen.  It would be great if in the settings you could set a ‚Äúspending limit‚Äù for games. The game currently will default to the most expensive table you can afford, so if you spend months working up to 1M coins you could potential lose it all if you accidentally tap the default, most expensive table.  It would just be a nice addition.  For Nine ball mode, could you add where you have to call your shot.  The game losses it‚Äôs strategy of playing defensive shots when you can use the guideline to sneak it in and just smash everything and hope you make a ball.  10 ball would be a fun addition too.  Doubles and a three man game like cut throat would be fun too.

title: Fixed game
text:
I play this game then and now. Years back it was a clean play, not much of a money trap. I started playing again last month and in beginning everything was going okay, fair game. One day I bought pool pass and that‚Äôs when the real game started. Before pool pass, I used to win 3/5 games but after buying it became 1/5. I lost around 2M in just one day. Got very frustrated and started  to feel very low. I lost 2 Cairo match both on black ball in one it stop so closed to the pot and in another both black and white ball were potted. So I thought to play until I have coins and well now I have 5 coins. I can‚Äôt believe I lost many game on black ball. 
And I understood it all started when I bought pool pass. So I think once you put real money in it that‚Äôs when i feel it‚Äôs fixed. 
Please don‚Äôt purchase anything because once you do it the game  will excite and frustrate you at the same time to put real money in it.  And believe all you get in the end is frustration and disappointment to make you feel low.

title: The Best billiards game on the internet!
text:
I admit I'm absolutely addicted to this game! It's just part of my life! I try to faithfully collect  my free coins hourly.

Pros: 1)  Tons of fun!
           2)  I like talking trash while playing!
           3)  I enjoy leveling-up.
           4)  It's nice collecting rings.

Cons:  1)  Too many glitches/crashes which lead to me losing    my turn or the game!!
             2)  Trickery regarding accidental clicking on highest games when swiping through the cities!  It's set up to trick you into playing a high level game you'll probably lose and end up buying more coins! Silly rabbit...tricks are for kids! Shame on the developers for this!!!
              3)  Seems like fake players on challenges --Lowest level opponents play like Pool Sharks with random numbered names.
               4)   Some days it's just set up for you to lose EVERY FREAKING GAME! You're CLEARLY lined-up shot may time-out, miss impossibly so, or simply skip your turn and say, " your time ran out, or maybe when I go to touch your cue, it reads that you didn't hit the ball and I just takes your shot away from you üò≠!
All-in-all, I'm thoroughly addicted and will probably never stop playing... But PLEASE: Fix some of these annoying issues !

title: Good game, but there is bad stuff
text: Ok, I like the game, and the physics are more realistic than GamePidgeon. But there are 3 problems I have with this game. One, it is 75% luck. My opponent will not have a shot, randomly full power somewhere and sink the 9 to take my coins. That‚Äôs not pool. If you‚Äôve ever watched real pool, rarely do pros fluke the 9. Two, the phenomenon of throw is not induced. If I hit a ball with left spin, the ball it first contacts is thrown to the right. This is not in the game. And three, there is no courtesy. This is not as big a deal, but if I play indirectly, (bank shots, kick shots) I expect some of my more skilled opponents to do the same. I‚Äôve played level 300s in 500 coin games who have potted 70 million balls and they still don‚Äôt play indirect when I do. So overall,  if you wanna tryhard, go ahead, but don‚Äôt be surprised if your opponent is a pain or gets the 9 in on the break. And one more thing, the daily spin is rigged. Good luck.

title: I‚Äôm not happy
text: I love the game but for some reason or another my coins were stolen right before my eyes. I had this game open on my tablet and what took place next was an eye opener. The screen said the game was being open on another device . I could not for the life of me understand how could that be possible, when I‚Äôm not trying to play this game on another device. With in 5 min my coins were gone . Who ever did it was an expert at it. Took every last coin I had. I then get a message from you all saying ‚Ä¶ a third party ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶ something , something and if I do this again my account would be band permanently. Please explain to me how I can I be responsible for stealing my own coin? Since that happy I‚Äôm slowly building my coins back up.

title: Betting.
text:
I want to bet pool cash. I want to choose how many dollars I bet‚Ä¶ I have pool cue‚Äôs I don‚Äôt want, there should be an option to sell any stick I own and special prices for each level of power or unique cue. I want the option to upload any pic and have it be my table felt, so everyone I play can see a part of who I am. And can change it at any time! Jump shots should be possible but only with full jump ball power bars built up by called shots and trick shots And why in the world would you take 10% coins from certain games?? It‚Äôs not legit payouts‚Ä¶.. I‚Äôm 
  And possibly the ability to change my ‚ÄúCalled Pocket‚Äù‚Ä¶. In real life we get to change pockets‚Ä¶. Why not here

title: EMPTY ACCOUNT
text: Recently purchased the Pool Pass on my game. Didn‚Äôt know it charged me twice for the pass (which is completely not my fault), so I went to get my refund on one of them (which I still didn‚Äôt get my money back üòïüòï). My screen froze up and I didn‚Äôt think it went through , so I asked for a refund again. Went to sleep & woke up to a COMPLETELY EMPTY account (0 cash and 0 coins). All the coins I had ..... gone. All the cash I had ..... gone. I had almost 49 thousand coins. I‚Äôd appreciate if my coins & cash would return to my pool account for the full 5 stars & repurchase of the pool pass if you don‚Äôt charge me twice (there‚Äôs no way one should be able to purchase the pool pass twice). And I would also like all of my CUES back as well. THANKS !!

title: Great game but has a few problems
text: I absolutely love this game, I play it with my siblings often. A problem I had just a few moments ago, though, was that I was winning a game, and shot the 8 ball in the pocket. It says connection is slow which was odd because I usually have pretty good connection. Then it said I ran out of time, so my shot at the 8 ball didn‚Äôt count, then it gave the other person the chance to shoot, and they won. Just to be clear, I did not run out of time‚Ä¶ Some things that could be changed about the game could be that once you pass a certain level, you should move leagues as well. Keep the trophies, but I just think at a certain level we shouldn‚Äôt be left behind. I also am not a fan of the trophies won being limited at each place. It stops us from progressing and moving up into higher leagues.

title: New update
text:
I love the game I play it every day for hours and hours, it is a great game and I love it.

Recently with the new update that my app just had today I‚Äôve been finding that not only are the trophies  a little confusing but that there is a problem with them. I definitely do not mind the update and I like that there‚Äôs new stuff being added to the game so the new trophy update is good and I love it, the problem is that the game seems to be glitching ever since the update and not only that but when I win my trophies do not go up.

I have won in Se√∫l, Bombay, and Berlin multiple times even going in a 10 game win streak and the trophies don‚Äôt change in any category, the problem with this is that when I loose the trophies do go down, so they have been declining so fast and there is no way for me to equal that with wins because even when I win my trophies don‚Äôt go up, they only go down.

Like I said I love this game so much and I would hate that an issue like this would ruin my experience and make me not like it, especially since I‚Äôve been playing for a long time. I really appreciate the time for reading this and if I could get a solution for that I would be more than happy.

GREAT GAME!!

title: Bugs
text: When playing this game the power bar goes away till you move the ball to a different position, this is during a regular game that I have played before and when you already called a pocket and the new position makes it very difficult to make that shot, not to mention the the timer is still going down and you lose due to running out of time. This has happened more than 30 times in the last week. Also if I just tap the side of my I pad when turning it to get a better perspective of the shot, it takes that tap as my shot and I again lose my turn and the game, because in this game one mistake usually means losing.  Also when I am trying to fine tune my aim the cue stick locks up, again the timer cause me to lose.

title: SOMEONE FROM DEV BEEDS TO RESPOND
text:
They make it incredibly difficult... after a long break away I started playing again. Now I have had the same issue as before...  they make it impossible to contact them (purposefully I am sure)... I‚Äôd like to get my bankroll restored (see below)... twice in the last two months I accidentally touched the screen and a game started playing and by the time I realized it I had pretty much lost. 

Here is my previous review: (same story different day)

Totally dig the game but the interface has a fatal flaw... if you accidentally touch your screen wrong while trying to swipe to a specific pool casino, it can wipe out your bankroll that you've worked long and hard on building up. 

Some genius automatically put the casino equal to your bankroll as the starting point each time. So if you have $101,000 it offers you the $100,000 buy-in as the starting point. So if you accidentally touch your screen or swipe wrong you get loaded into that game and if you lose... tough crap.

So... being that is incredibly frustrating I probably will not play a game I actually enjoy... what's the purpose?

On top of that, I cannot find a tech support contact to see about restoring a game that not only did I not mean to play, but I didn't even know I was playing until it was too late and the table was virtually cleared.

If someone would like to contact me to rectify I will consider playing once again.

title: Fun, but not fun
text:
This could be a great game, but here‚Äôs some issues:
In the middle of game play, it cuts completely out. You‚Äôre back to the main screen which is loading. Sometimes you return to the game, sometimes you don‚Äôt. So you‚Äôve just lost coins 
It can take forever to earn bucks. I only have 8 and it‚Äôs been like that for the past year. 
The spinning wheel at the beginning will never let you win anything higher than 250. Most of the times you‚Äôll land on something less than that. 
You can aim directly at a pocket with the correct amount of speed and the ball still doesn‚Äôt go in. This can be confusing to new players that need practice to help them on the real billiards game. 
The conversations could be opened up for all players instead of just friends. But I understand that is the game‚Äôs way of making money. You have to purchase a packet with pre-written words. That‚Äôs annoying. I would give the game a 5 star if this allowed you to talk freely because it‚Äôs more fun communicating with people that are going through the same thing as you while playing. 
However, as you continue to play, you are matched up according to who‚Äôs online and your skill level. That‚Äôs fun. 
You do learn more about the game of billiards as you continue to play. 
The game is still a good game when it doesn‚Äôt mess up.

title: Fun with glitches
text: Best game available yet the server errors distract consistently to cause loss of games. As most will find this game has a connection issue consistently, it times out causing you to miss a shot. I've had a game completely crash it's not on my side with my Wi-Fi, it's simply the game itself. Some improvements such as less monetary pop ups, they're always asking for money for this or that. It is getting extremely annoying. Also the pool rules are not the official rules. The setting of the cue ball after scratch and the added benefit, per se having the directional lines associate with the Q Ball make the game a little too easy it would be nice if there is a way to play games with out this added benefits to be more difficult except on the highest matches. Developers need to work on this game a little more. Revised to one star as I have lost on a simple eight ball and nine ball at least a dozen times because of time out due to their server error.

title: Real 8 ball pool
text: I have come enjoy 8 ball pool over the course of a year! However, there only 1 problem!!!! In REAL pool if someone scratches the cue ball the cue ball has to stay behind the middle diamonds on one side of the table. Do you know how frustrating it is when you scratch them the other person moves all around the table when in reality, you don‚Äôt do that and or can‚Äôt! I would enjoy it more if the opposing person could not move it as if he didn‚Äôt know what to do with his or her trigger finger!! If I ever stop playing 8 ball pool, it will be due to other people it playing right!!! I like a challenge I don‚Äôt like finding the easy way out. When I scratch y‚Äôall give the other people an easy way out. It‚Äôs kinda sad really because people rely on that!! Not this man though!

title: Addictive, easy to learn hard to master
text:
The only gripe I have is that since you're put up against people from all over of every age, occasionally there are some who don't care about the game and as someone who enjoys it, I find that un satisfying. Also, it costs to practice with yourself and that's rude lol

I recently noticed that you are able to get cash once a day by watching a short ad video. I have been playing this game for a while now and I am so happy they have added this. Before, you received one when you level up or if you purchase the packs. Thanks for that. I really enjoy this game and I hope you continue to work on those little things because it‚Äôs one of my favorite daily pastimes. How funny how I originally only downloaded it to help my dad out ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: üÖºüÖ¥üÜÇüÜÇüÖ¥üÖ≥  üÜÑüÖø
text:
This game is messed up. I am a pro pool player in real life and this game, but there is always something stupid that gets me to loose in this game.
Take today for example: My opponent and I both had the 8-ball left as I shot the 8-ball in successfully. But suddenly, the app said "Connection is slow". 10 seconds later, the game resumed, except the 8-ball was back to where it was before I shot it and it was my opponent's turn!!! Then, he/she got to move the ball anywhere they wanted to shoot the 8-ball, and won. This was so frustrating to watch. Furthermore, I lost my 5000 coins I used to play. This was all because of some stupid glitch. And let me tell you that I am not exaggerating at all and that my WiFi is one of THE BEST.
I should give this a one-star, but I won't, because I believe that you can fix this game. And if you do read this review, don't just look away, because there are probably many others who have the problems that I do.

title: Ok
text: This game seems to take more than it gives. While it‚Äôs a fun game to play it‚Äôs also very one sided. I‚Äôve worked hard to gain points, doing so takes forever and you can lose them all in no time. I‚Äôve even purchased coins that truly have no real gain yet takes real money. Again, it takes no time to lose all your coins and forever to gain. Having played this game as long as I have, I believe it is rigged to make you lose for a certain period of time and a certain period of time allows you to be on a winning streak. My constant percentage, is 54% games won at any given time. How is that possible if it‚Äôs not controlled? I‚Äôm about to delete the game because I‚Äôm fed up with it. There is absolute no way I go from having 700k+ coins to not being able to win a single game and literally lose and go all the way down to 7k. All you get each hour is 30 lousy coins per hour. This game is a joke and I‚Äôm sick and tired of it. It‚Äôs not worth it. It‚Äôs a bunch of bull and developers should be ashamed.

title: Steve
text: Overall good game but definitely has flaws! Very addictive and mostly fair but at times you can tell there is some inconsistent plays as well as scratches on the cue that definitely should not be. Also I have played the exact same game (9-Ball, 1 on 1, etc.) sometimes 6 in a row and only got to break 1 of those 6 times. But as mentioned, even though I get frustrated occasionally it's entertaining to play This is actually the second review that I had to add to initial. It seems the more levels up you get the crappier the game gets for you, unfair glitches and other OBVIOUS engineered malfunctions keep you from improving so you will have to purchase more coins. I will be avoiding this game if it continues even though I know that doesn't mean diddly to the "8 Ball Pool" co. Which is sad!!

title: PROGRAMMING FOR LOSING!!!
text: As I was getting on a great streak of winning games and having high amount of winnings, the game started having some serious issues with only my turnsüò≥, all of a sudden a opponent who was taking some crazy amazing fast shots quickly won the game. I understand there are some talented players out there but why did my turn only freeze and I ran out of time both times. Its great for fun and relaxing but it definitely is programmed for people to spend their money in to losing and getting addicted to the game. Program a game that is going to play it straight 100% (Be honest with the game so people will feel confident and would like to spend extra money for fun. Disappointed at the dishonesty on the programming side of the game.

title: Fun when you‚Äôre playing legit players
text: Filled with cheaters, superhuman bots, and sweats. You‚Äôve been warned. The people that play this game as intended like myself have low win rates (like mid 40s and below). There‚Äôs two kinds of cheaters. One is painfully obvious the other is not so much until you know what to look for. The obvious one is aim bot. The player will aim the cue at a ball and then it instantly changes direction and hits another ball (sometimes the ball will bank multiple times before sinking in on called pocket) the other kind of cheater is the less obvious one with an aim tool that gives them unlimited aim so they can see exactly where the ball is going and where it‚Äôll end up. Those ones can be spotted if they have a difficult shot and take hardly any time to aim and nail it. The sweats are the ones that know the meta, what cue to use, how to break perfectly every time, use a ruler to aim long shots‚Ä¶ Ect Ect‚Ä¶ this is not a chill game whatsoever. You‚Äôve been warned once again.

title: I lost 5 million coins to a bug. And some other issues
text:
When I tried opening crates I tap to make all the cards appear faster but forever the reason it takes you to a match if you are in the 1 v 1 I had 8 million now I am at 3 million I never was ask if I want to play in the match I was force and I couldn‚Äôt exited out in time and had to play someone with much better skill set than mine. Because of that I don‚Äôt want to play this game often anymore if that acts that like all the time. This happens to me more than one a day and it‚Äôs very annoying. I just want the 5 million coins that I lost back.

I hate that I am always facing people who are way better than me I will lose 8 games in a row and I face someone who 50 levels ahead of me, 3 ranks above me, and has won 5 games in a row. I am very tired of being angry all of the time because of this game. I don‚Äôt mind if I lose but I shouldnt lose 8 times in a row then win one game by luck and lose 8 more games.

title: Not real mechanics or probabilities
text:
So I have been playing 8Pool now for several months and although it can be fun to pass time, the game is stacked towards making money and at times can be stacked against YOU. In addition the pool mechanics are not exact, are inconsistent and the spinning wheel does what the game owners tell it to do, not what a real spinning wheel would land on with probability. Here are some of my observations:
1) The spinning wheel always lands on 100 or 250 for the free spin. After hundreds of spins, the wheel would have landed on at least 1 good hit. Don‚Äôt expect realistic probability
2) The ball does NOT always follow the rebound shot indicated on the indicated line. Frequently a ball will not follow the demonstrated rebound line directions
3) with the same applied cue force, the ball will not always follow mechanics with the same cue. Sometimes you will roll forward and pot the cue ball. Sometimes it will stay in place. Sometimes it will roll backward. No consistent mechanics with the same cue and same force shot
4) ‚ÄúSwinging for the fence‚Äù meaning full force cue shots at weird angles against the cushion will nearly always give u a fantastical ball sinking
5) Spending money gets you more chips faster ‚Ä¶ranks you up faster and ‚Äòseems‚Äô to better your odds of winning against your opponents

title: The game is rigged to encourage you to purchase more tokens
text:
I‚Äôd like to start by saying I‚Äôve played this game a few hundred times and I have a win percentage of 58. On countless occasions I have seen this game do many different things to cause you to lose, and many time in a row drawing your stash. 
Mostly, I‚Äôve seen balls move off of their trajectory and into a pocket, usually the cue ball. 
I‚Äôve seen on almost every run, when you get down to the money ball, despite the English you put on it, 90% of the the time the ball will roll behind another ball blocking your shot. 
Then when you got to do a  simple one rail kick with no English to make contact, it will bounce at an angle nowhere near what you aimed at. Giving the opponent ball in hand which usually mean a loss at higher stakes and skill level. Which is where I enjoy playing. 

It seems that the only way to level up is to dump money into the app. Don‚Äôt spend any money and you‚Äôre forced to stay in the lower tiers which don‚Äôt pay out nearly as much XP or points. You will loose many time in a row and run out of coins. 
The easiest games I play and the highest win streaks are always after I put money into the game, but then in a matter of time it‚Äôs like I can‚Äôt make a shot to save my life and lose lose lose. 
This game could be great if they would stop with the shady antics. You‚Äôre already getting tons of money from advertising.

title: Help
text:
I love this game but my only problem with this is it‚Äôs a huge one one that cost me money and it‚Äôs not worth downloading after that I had a phone that I was using to play this game but it broke there‚Äôs no way I can turn it back on so that means there‚Äôs no way to uninstall that game on that broke phone so when I got a new phone and installed that game it threatened to ban me from the game which means I would lose all the progress that I had gone through over five years I‚Äôm not trying to transfer coins between games or any of that mess 
But there‚Äôs nothing I can do about it every time I try to login and play it sends me this alert, telling me it‚Äôs using a third-party to notify them of transferring coins. Please fix this.

title: Wanted to like it
text: Game started out fun. As you level up you start to realize things...the main thing is pretty much all you face is computer players that will not lose. How can you tell this? The fact that whenever you start a game there's always a player ready without waiting..after you play a good bit you get to the point where you aren't given a chance to even hit a ball..then shown "specials" to buy more coins and crap to keep you playing after you get addicted...started out fun..ended extremely frustrating...plus glitches that end games after you have put up your amount of coins and not give them back. Wrote the game site about the issue going on a month and still no response..the mean time the crashing is still an issue. Don‚Äôt bother contacting ‚Äútech support‚Äù after two months of not being able to load app the people want to check and see how the process went..that means they completed the ticket without a fix...joke of a company

title: Updated my star rating
text: I originally gave this game a 5 star, but I took it down to 2 stars because of their horrible update.  Every time I get my ‚ÄúFree‚Äù coins for the day is fine, but once i have the option to get more coins by watching advertisements which ‚ÄúThey‚Äù get paid for by ‚Äúviews‚Äù I cannot get out of the advertisement.  I click on the ‚Äúx‚Äù after the ad is done and it just goes back to the download page. There is no way to get out of thes ads and i have to quit the game in order to do so.  Once I get back in the game, i have to watch the ad again just to get my coins.  And most of the time it just happens again.  This is either a pretty shady practice to generate more revenue, or the game needs and UPDATE Fast!

title: One critique
text: Big fan of the game but it would be nice to limit English and draw abilities based on realistic physical limitations. Example- when cue ball is married to the rail on a real- life table, and one is shooting over the rail, the cue ball cannot be hit on the bottom because the rail is blocking it. However in this game, one would have the ability to use draw (bottom- ball hit) on this shot despite it being physically impossible to do so. Object balls that cover parts of the cue ball also have no effect like they would in real pool. It seems like a small detail, but factors like this could mean a win or loss in many situations. I would like to see these limitations enacted to make the game more true to real pool. Other than that, this is a great game

title: Glitchy as hell!  **UPDATE**
text:
Lately there have been so many glitches going on I‚Äôm about to ditch this game.  One other person I know and I have both won games and it‚Äôs awarded the win to the wrong person.  Several times I set up a shot and suddenly all the balls change positions.  Sometimes the balls look different sizes.  On and on.  Not much fun anymore.
** BEWARE**. Charges to my iTunes account that can‚Äôt be explained.  There‚Äôs really no practical way of knowing what you bought and when unless you keep a pen and paper next to you.  One thing for certain, I didn‚Äôt buy any Golden Spins or Special Packs when I already had over 1M coins to play with and I certainly didn‚Äôt purchase almost $125 worth in the short time I played this game!  Play at your own financial risk!!

title: Ok
text:
First if you have a US IP expect a lot of losing.  There is heavy favoritism for Middle East IPs to win.  I have seen when playing people from that part of the world the que ball almost do a full 180 to make sure the other person gets the shot in.  How do you increase your losing...spend money on the game.  You will greatly increase your losing.  Also the ‚Äútables‚Äù seem to get slicker when I play sometimes to a level that is totally unnatural

Why do I still play?  If I keep my spending low and don‚Äôt expect to get anywhere in the game it passes the time nothing else.  So that is why I say it is ok

I have recently noticed that when you win you sometimes don‚Äôt get the points.  It is a ploy to make you lose points/money so you will spend more real money.  So don‚Äôt expect much other than a short term bit of fun.  The creators are very tricky on how they make you lose points/money to spend real money.

title: Player beware you can bet your fortune away by accident!
text:
This game is an awesome way to pass some time. The software is designed to cheat you of your coins.
The more coins you win the game automatically sets you up to play the maximum credits that your Bank allows you. If you make a mistake you will loose your entire bank in one game having to play a game that you tapped on by accident. They have a pool game that is all in. When you tap it makes you confirm that you want to play that amount of coins. I grabbed my phone and heard coins setting up for a game and bet 2.5 million coins on complete accident of course I‚Äôm so upset that I loose. This is not fair at all. It should ask you to confirm anything over 100k. When you play 8 ball it asks you to confirm your bet.

title: Enjoyable world wide!
text: Very fun and can be educational in the context of angles and force applied and how every action has a direct and opposite reaction. I enjoy playing with people all over the world and if they friend you back you can have simple conversations by the supplied keyboard. The only improvements I would make are: lower coin value games where every shot must be called. And once you reach a certain level in ability AND you have give monetary support to the app you in app purchases you should be able to go to a table and practice different shots and learn how to use the hash marks correctly. Overall I give it 4 stars cause it does need to cater a little more to those who spend cash on purchases. I do NOT want this game to turn into whomever has the most $$ to spend is the best. Skill must be kept the driving force.

title: Good game but BIG design flaw
text: I have enjoyed this game a few months and have built up my $$ with careful play and use of rewards and tournaments. I just surpassed 950K and went in to the Play 1 on 1 section to play a game in Las Vegas with a 10K entry. Because of the flawed design of this game as I put my finger on the screen to scroll to the game, I inadvertently hit the Dubai game, which is the first game to show up in the 1 on1 section. The entry fee is 500K and there went a month of hard work building up my funds because of course I lost. This has happened to me twice before, and in spite of being very careful it happened again. PLEASE at least give us a ‚ÄúAre you sure?‚Äù before we commit to the entry fees! Other than that I really like this game.

title: This game blows
text: I‚Äôve been playing this game for way longer than I should have been playing it. Going on probably 2 years now and in those 2 years I‚Äôve never won anything higher than 250 coins on the daily spin. I even broke down and spent real money on this garbage and still never got anything good back. The games are rigged. I‚Äôm level 47 and I got matched with a level 150. How is that even fair? Then there‚Äôs times I barely pull back on the stick and it just smashes the ball for no reason. Also the rules for this game aren‚Äôt even right. It‚Äôd be cool if the rules actually matched the rules you‚Äôd have in a real life pool league instead of just being able to smash balls around or the bs ball in hand you get when the ball doesn‚Äôt go in the pocket that was called. The creators of this game need to do some research on real life pool leagues. This game is garbage and I wouldn‚Äôt waste your time or money on it. 0 stars for you chumps but of course they won‚Äôt let you so you have to give 1 star. Garbage.

title: Fun when legit
text:
**update***
The game is borderline criminal. If you learn how to take shots to avoid the scratching algorithm, the game decides to make your aiming wheel jumpy and impossible to get proper aim, or inconspicuously speeds up your time allotment. Apple really should investigate the game for the money they continue to steal from players based on the programming irregularities. I‚Äôve played this game over 2000 times and it‚Äôs quite obvious when the programming changes.

This game is quite fun when it allows you to play other opponents strictly on skill. But when it pairs you against a bot, or sets the algorithm to make you scratch, it‚Äôs quite the joke. I was hesitant to write a review, but after reading many others with the same issue, I have to suggest you spend your money with a different game. I wish there was a ‚Äúsave video replay‚Äù for shots so we could post them for peer review to show how ridiculously rigged the game is.

title: My view from the couch
text:
I do enjoy the game, not the bots. I have lost multiple tens of millions to cheaters with no way to report them. People pay money, only to get ripped off, which is why I don‚Äôt spend money any more on this. Lastly, the prizes on the wheel of misfortune are insulting. I have been playing and spinning for years, and always score the lowest coin prizes on the wheel. It is a waist of my time and a cheap gimmick. If you gave golden spins every day, people would buy more. Just Saying.

This is my second account after rage quitting and deleting my last account when a bot stole a fifty million dollar game from me. Find a way to give players the opportunity to report cheaters and refund them the coins that were stolen. 

Steve

title: Total crap
text: Fouls on the break shot not handled correctly.  The physics programming for sidespin on the cue ball is crap.  Making the eight ball on the break for most league play isn't a win anymore, but in almost all leagues, you have to call the eight ball pocket shot. This game rewards more poor shot-making than I have ever seen in over 25 years of playing pool on my table.  Slop shots count by design in 9-ball and 8-ball up to a point.  A player shouldn't be allowed to slop in the 8-ball and still win the game.  I have to agree with other reviews that once you purchase something for REAL MONEY, you are nothing but a target for the bots after that.  I'm rated at a level 40, and are being put up against level 100 or higher players in tournaments.  I have been put up against supposed players rated lower than me called guest players that have run out on me more than anyone ever has in my entire pool playing career.  Have the designers of this game even spent any actual time playing league pool?  It seems not.

title: Rigged
text: This game is completely rigged for people who are a higher rank than you. Even if they are only one level ahead of you they still have way better odds than you. One example is how I was playing on level 5 against a level 7 we each had one ball left plus the 8 ball. I take my shot hit my ball in the cue ball bounces of the rail and did not go in a hole therefore i should of had another turn but instead the ball goes to the other person (without the option of putting it where they would like ) and continues on to win the game. This has happened almost every time I‚Äôve played. Another reason why this game is rigged is how I was playing level 7 against a level 9 and they had the option of putting the cue ball wherever they wanted no matter if I putted the cue ball or not which ended in them winning the 5000 coins and me losing my 2500 coins without a fair chance to win. I also think this game should be more realistic to actual pool with the same rules.

title: Money Pit
text: The game is OK for a little while, but once you buy an in-app purchase suddenly your cue ball doesn‚Äôt seem to behave the way it should.  The game is rigged to give you some incentive to keep you hooked and believing that you are improving and maybe could win billions of coin, but then suddenly and equally mysteriously you go on a losing streak all geared towards selling you more coins.  Stick to small games and have fun not betting or losing too much coins and you‚Äôll be fine.  Spend some real money to get a better cue stick or compete in higher bet games and eventually you‚Äôll lose and ads to buy more coins will appear.  Don‚Äôt get me wrong, this is still a fun game at times, but beware that it is a computer and a for profit enterprise so they need to sell you something.  If you understand that you‚Äôll find more enjoyment. If you don‚Äôt like games that are rigged towards maximizing you spending real money on the game, then don‚Äôt bother.  Good luck!

title: Glitches glitches glitches Waiting for internet connection lost so long and glitches
text: I give it one star , but I tapped 5 to get your attention ,,, To much of my time is spent waiting for so called internet connection lost , I have great connection while at home , none of my other apps are having any loss of connection, sooooo frustrating, also be EXTREMELY careful not to hit an expensive game there is no confirmation second chance , you may loose an EXTREME AMOUNT . There is also another glitch that make you loose your turn or reset the last ball you hit while clock still going,it has happened about a dozen times usually giving my opponent an advantage  , that glitch is the last straw

title: Matching Algorithm for matches is horrible!
text: I have been playing for a while and one thing that continues to bother me is the match making. Just today, me ‚Äúlevel 29‚Äù being matched with someone level 57 and also someone level 80+. It ruins the fun of the game when you are constantly losing to people that have been playing longer than you have. I have lost over 250,000 coins tonight due to being matched with people of a much higher level than I. Also, while playing 8 matches, I only started the game once. Since being unable to break and also being matched to players of much higher skill, I did not get a turn on many of those game. This is complete bull crap and I should get the coins that I lost in those games back. I hate that this happens and it should be fixed. There should be a limit on how far apart the levels can be if they are matched together.

title: I enjoyed it so much but...
text:
I‚Äôve playing this for many years but not all the time I love 8 pools game app and also in real life :)
So the only problem for me is when I play the special even championship ones like right now they have Dublin Pub Championship it‚Äôs entry free for the first time so I‚Äôve win the first game so it should continue to the second one to begin to correct points but mine it‚Äôs turn to start from beginning like I‚Äôve lost on the first game and to re-enter I have to use 1 cash game and I‚Äôve tried that too cause I think it might be work this time but nope.. I‚Äôve tried for like 5-6times and I keep losing the cash game that I have ( I win but it keep return to the start ) so can you guys fix that please !! Im sure that many people they might have the same problem as me , I don‚Äôt wanna losing money for nothing :(

title: 8 ball hack and glitch
text: This has to be the most unfair and hacked game in the entire App Store. When you reach out to the developers they even respond that your issue was likely due to playing against someone using a hack. I‚Äôm it making this up. The glitches at out of control as well. If anyone actually spends real money in the in app purchases after reading this review you don‚Äôt have anyone to blame but yourself because you have been warned. I‚Äôve never seen a game so prevalently hacked and cheated in my whole life. In a matter of seconds you can find and download a hack for the game and now I know why those are out there. The developers don‚Äôt even care. Instead of preventing the hacks they actually have made blaming the hacks a part of their answer when anyone reaches out with problems with the game. It‚Äôs a fun game when you are in the entry level stages but once you get going the players using hacks take all the fun out of it. It‚Äôs ridiculous.

title: DISSATISFIED AND DISAPPOINTED !!!!!!!!!!!!
text: THIS GAME OS REALLY AGGRAVATING MULTIPLE TIMES I HAVE PLAYED THE 25 MILLION AND IF I LOOSE I GET NOTHING I THINK ITS REALLY NOT FAIR AT ALL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I have spent a lot of money trying to get surprise boxes to upgrade my cues and even on the free ones you get nothing but the lower end ones. I think you should revamp something so players don‚Äôt have to spend money to get nothing. I love the game but it gets frustrating when you keep spending and getting nothing in return. Not to mention when you buy a surprise box the level is not the same as when you go to the cues so which one is right. I just can‚Äôt believe they just keep giving crap for the money you spend. Especially right now in these times where money is tight. And the new problem is that people can cheat I mean some have played and won 100 games and already he a billion dollars it‚Äôs just sad all the fun is gone.

title: Great game but it has some flaws‚Ä¶
text: Like i said the game is absolutely great but the issues i face seem to keep me from properly progressing in the game I feel that the game would be 1000 times better if my little rank 26 self wasnt being put up against players rank 100+ i mean seriously if a player‚Äôs accuracy gets better with rank why throw them through the wringer like that and the other issue is when you have to call pocket on the 8 ball i feel if you can manage to get your last ball in along with the 8 so long as a players final ball goes in first if you can call pocket you should be given the option instead of being forced to pull your shot but other than those complaints the game is awesome just could be improved in a few areas

title: Bad bad bad
text:
How come every shot is a scratch shot how come i cant win how come my cue moves by its self , how come this game wont let me play a clean game ? Hides the ball . Scratches on me every shot , get to a certain point , and the game takes it all back ! Discouraging , Editors Choice ? Come watch me play a game see for your self how the game messes with you . I made it to 56.6 % 
Been to a million + 3 times and every time it runs me back to 0 . Open the game one time had a million one log in the game opens on a million game ! What  ? Opponent breaks the balls 2 shots all his ball are gone eight ball gone . Six months of hard play gone in one messed up game . Really o he was A 652 . Now i cant get above 10,000 and my 56.6 % was Stuck at 54.4 % for the last 2 years and it finally changed to 54.3 % and you want me to buy no way . Games fun when it‚Äôs not messing with you .

title: Takes more money than should
text: It is a fun game and all but I noticed that it has been taking more money than it should. I was doing a 500 bet and had about 11,000 after game had started. I ended up winning the 1,000 but instead of giving me the money it took me down to just over 8,000. The next game I play a was 100 bet of course I lost and it should of only took that 100 away but instead it took me down to a little over 7000. Other than cheating me of. My money it's a fun a game. That is the only issue I really have with it and why but gets 3 stars. It did it again after winning a game I should of won 1000 but once again it takes nearly 4000 away from me. Fix this problem you should only loose money from what  u use to upgrade your stuff or when you loose a game  just what you bet. It shouldn't be cheating you out of your money. Fix this issue. Fixing  the rating to a 2 star until issue is fixed.

title: This game keeps on glitching !!!
text: I rate the game a 5 star because I love the game but ever sense this new update this game has been getting on my nerves. You see each time I open the game after about 49 seconds the game glitches and gets me of the game. But after I leave the game for a week and get back on it. It always gives me coins. When I had 1000 coins the game glitched and when I clicked my box that I got from winning a game before this mess started,and opened my box and said it was going to give me 100 coins. It glitched and the game thought that it was going to give me 100,000 coins so it gave me 100,000 coins. Ever since that the only gave me 49 seconds to try and play or less. Creators of this game please fix this I love this game and don‚Äôt want to stop playing it.

title: Overall a pretty well developed game except for this one bug
text: There is this one bug that I have faced about six times all of which have been in SIGNIFICANTLY large prize games. The bug I‚Äôm talking about is when it‚Äôs your turn and if you make the ball in the game says connection is slow then after the sign disappears it says you ran out of time and then the turn is given to your opponent with ball in hand which doesn‚Äôt make sense cuz I got it in on time but I ‚Äúrun out of time‚Äù PLEASE fix this bug it is quite literally making me lose my games and is just game breaking in a bad way. It basically lets the opponent have ball in hand and it doesn‚Äôt matter if you made it in or not it will still say that the opponent has ball in hand and that you ran out of time

title: Few issues!
text:
Great app game as I play a lot of pool for real. My criticism is when having to call a pocket for the eight ball you should be able to eye up your shot in order to pick the best shot before having to choose a pocket. That bugs the crap out of me that you have to choose the pocket first. In 9 ball it is ridiculous to have your shot clock extremely shortened because you are running the table so by the time you get to the 9 ball you have to 2 seconds to shoot! That‚Äôs absurd! Then if you miss the shot because you were so rushed your opponent gets the full shot clock to pick his nose, make a sandwich, then shoot the 9 ball to win. I don‚Äôt mind a shortened clock but 2 seconds is ridiculous!!
There is also some sort of glitch in 8 ball in at least the 100k game where two different times, coincidentally both the 14 ball was made successfully but turned the shot over to the opponent. In both cases I lost the game. Very frustrating!!

title: Game is fun and good, but awful practice
text:
I‚Äôm mainly making this review because the golden shot mini game is rigged! I got the yellow two times in a row now and it says better luck next time or whatever. Now onto the rest..
I like to play this game because it‚Äôs fun, but all the forced ads and in app purchases are so toxic. Like I bet it‚Äôs a free game but they turn it up to 100. I haven‚Äôt felt like I needed to actually buy anything so far, but I swear there is some pay to win because sometimes people are able to move the white ball even tho I didn‚Äôt pocket it. Maybe I‚Äôm just being dumb on that. Though there are like rpg stats on cues so that could be pay to win, at the same time there‚Äôs like a limit or something on how much u can use a cue u unlock or buy which is dumb. 
Overall good game, but beware if you can‚Äôt help yourself with in app purchases or pay2win then avoid it because it‚Äôs a lot.
